pages.text: The Origins mod allows you to choose a unique origin for your character, which grants special abilities and traits.$(br)The mod has been slightly altered from its base:$(br2)$(l)1.$() Each origin has received slight balancing tweaks.$(br)$(l)2.$() The orb of origin can now be crafted.

pages.title: Origin Changes
pages.text: $(l)Enderian$():$(br)Can no longer reach further.$(br2)$(l)Merling$():$(br)No changes.$(br2)$(l)Phantom$():$(br)Phantom can now only be used when full hunger.$(br)Phantom also can only eat meat.

$(l)Elytrian$():$(br)No longer deals double damage while gliding.$(br2)$(l)Blazeborn$():$(br)Will not start the game in the Nether.$(br)Is no longer resistant to poison or hunger.$(br2)$(l)Avian$():$(br)No changes.
$(l)Arachnid$():$(br)No changes.$(br2)$(l)Shulk$():$(br)Has fewer additional inventory slots.$(br)Has 1 less heart of life.$(br)No longer has natural armor.$(br2)$(l)Feline$():$(br)No changes.
If you have any questions about these changes, feel free to bring them up.
